description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

【歌手介绍】
      Rascal Flatts由来自哥伦布的Gary Levox、Jay DeMarcus and Joe Don Rooney三名成员组成，是一个乡村音乐风格的乐队，他们以演唱和谐而闻名。
      两位表兄弟主唱gary levox、贝司手jay demarcus和好朋友吉它手joe don rooney三个人于1999年成立了乡村音乐三人组合“rascal flatts”，他们的同名首张专辑在发行后的第一周就卖出了11,274张，登上了billboard乡村音乐专辑排行榜的第14名，在billboard专辑排行榜上名列第122。他们吸收了福音、蓝草音乐，pop和r&b的音乐元素，形成了自己紧密和谐的乡村音乐风格。
      和很多美国当代乡村组合一样，Rascal Flatts的音乐中并没有传统乡村音乐的感觉，使用的传统乡村乐器也并不是很多，甚至有很多老牌乡村音乐人还批评Rascal Flatts的音乐太过流行化，就连组合成员Jay DeMarcus也笑称Rascal Flatts其实就是当代乡村音乐届的后街男孩（Backstreet Boys）和超级男孩（N Sync）。不过，Rascal Flatts就是以这种略带乡村感觉的情歌路线获得了之声和歌迷的青睐。

模唱部分：

【歌词】
【选唱部分】
I can take the rain on the roof of this empty house
空荡的屋顶上，任凭冰雨将我淋湿
That don't bother me　
痛楚的心都不会受到任何干扰
I can take a few tears now and then and just let them out
偶尔的热泪盈眶，以至泪水夺眶而出
I'm not afraid to cry every once in a while
这一时的痛哭我都不会在意
Even though going on with you gone still upsets me
即使你的离去依然令我心烦意乱
【模唱部分】
There are days every now and again I pretend I'm ok
我却还在不断地掩饰着自己
But that's not what gets me
但那皆非真正的折磨
What hurts the most
真正伤人至深的是
Was being so close
即使相距咫尺
And having so much to say
心中话语无尽
And watching you walk away
却只能目送你远去
And never knowing
而永远无法得知
What could have been
可能的结局
And not seeing that loving you
遭到冷遇的是
Is what I was trying to do
我对你一直的爱
It's hard to deal with the pain of losing you everywhere I go
无论身到何处，失去你的痛苦都让我难以承受
But I'm doing It
但我会努力面对
It's hard to force that smile when I see our old friends and I'm alone
当遇见旧日的朋友，而自己却孤身一人时，我只能勉强迎笑
Still Harder
更加艰难的是
Getting up, getting dressed, living with this regret
每日的起居生活中，我都在不断地悔恨
But I know if I could do it over
假如这一切可以重新来过
I would trade give away all the words that I saved in my heart
我愿倾出所有久藏心中话语
That I left unspoken
那些未曾流露的话
What hurts the most
真正伤人至深的是
is being so close
即使相距咫尺
And having so much to say
心中话语无尽
And watching you walk away
却只能目送你远去
And never knowing
而永远无法得知
What could have been
可能的结局
And not seeing that loving you
遭到冷遇的是
Is what I was trying to do
我对你一直的爱

讲解：

模唱：

想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>

title: 英文歌曲天天唱：What hurts the most

description:
Now for those of you who may have been bypassed by this publishing phenomenon, Fifty Shades began as a novel about a risque relationship between a young woman and an older man. The first book and two follow-ups have sold in record numbers around the world and made the author E. L. James a multi-millionaire. Now advertisers who hadn't already booked cinema advertising around the screen version are getting very hot under the collar because all the ads had been snapped up. I spoke to the CEO of cinema advertising firm Pearl & Dean Catherine Jacob and I asked her to tell me why advertisers were so keen to be part of the brand.

"Fifty Shades of Grey" has been subject to huge amount of pre-audience demands - tickets literally - from the moment that they went on sale. Pre-sales were huge.

It's quite a risque book, isn't it? For people who aren't aware of it, haven't read it, can you just give me a synopsis of what happens?

It's about a relationship between a powerful businessman and a young naive woman that he meets and how their relationship develops and it explores some quite adult themes in the book. So in the UK it's got a high-audience certificate because of the subject matter. But it was a massive best-seller and I think that partly fuelling the excitement. But I also think people who haven't read the book are going to go to see the film to see what all the fuss is about.
